description: This compact 2-piece board offers advanced, challenging grips for climbers who have some hangboard training experience.Smooth, skin-preserving texture.Dedicated closed-crimp grip with thumb support.Drafted pockets, at a slight angle for greater skin contact in the back of the hold, for improved joint safety.Steep slopers.Hold dimensions are distinct from the Training Center hangboard, making it a good extension of your training arsenal.
name: Trango Rock Prodigy Forge Hangboard
